title: Upstairs house on 10 perch land with garden for sale in Rajagiriya
details:
An upstairs newly built house in 10 perch land with garden for sale in Rajagiriya. Appreciating property prices in the area with ongoing development (Large to medium size companies moving their head offices and branches to the area. E.g. BMW)

Key Features:
- 3 bedrooms + 3 bathrooms.
- Maid’s quarters with attached bathroom.
- 2800 sq. ft. living space on 10 perch land.
- Large private parking space for 1 large SUV.
- Large garden and backyard.
- Asking price: 23 Million (Negotiable)

This property is located in a very peaceful living while being conveniently close to shops, schools and transport. (1 minute to bus stop, walking distance to Cargills Food City)

The price is only for the land at 2.3M per perch. The house is newly built with all works completed in the ground floor and half completed on the first floor. The buyer will need to complete the upstairs finishing after purchase.
